content: Okay, can you take the description and dialog we revised that related to the outline "We are introduced to the mirror in its past history in England many years before it was shipped off to America." This was the section where the movers were talking to each other. Make this around 400 words, and again, focus heavily on giving us a sense on where we are, what time we are in history through describing the scene but only giving any backstory on the mirror through the movers talking while they are getting the mirror ready for shipment. But refrain from narrating any history or making comments about it's powers except vaguely through dialog
